ARI.ai_verdict:

What's truly damning is their inability to close out winnable games. They've lost their last three by a combined 8 points, including blowing leads against Seattle and Tennessee. With a +1 turnover margin and decent red zone defense (47.1% TD rate allowed), they're doing just enough things right to keep games close, but not nearly enough to actually win them.
